review: I regret buying this device!  It does not consistently work with Netflix.  When it does work it is great but most of the time it will not load Netflix selections.  We have given up using it and went back to our old Roku.  We tried the various "fixes" and even replaced the unit.  A waste of time and money - if you want to access your Netflix account.UPDATE:  The unit was upgraded on 4//10/15 to version 54.1.1.0 and appears to work with Netflix - so far.  Hopefully the upgrade took care of the issue.  I like to use it when it is working correctly.UPDATE #2:  The upgrade did not fix the problem.  Can't consistently load Netflix.  Back to the Roku..
author: Kent Smith
